title: You know Ahri is at least a little over-tuned when

embed.description: Post with 2 views. Shared by leftyraydy.

body: Support Ahri does the most damage on our team and 2nd most in the game (only behind DRAAAAAAAVEN)

replies.body:
you dont show kda or items.

If she got fed, then of course she'll do most damage
I mean you are taking it too seriously like I said OMG NERF AHRI NOW. Although she is a little overtuned right now I dont think she is OP

https://imgur.com/a/TnOalDq
They were 6/5/13 and had Frostfang, Dcap, Ludens, Mpen boots and part of HG. Seems perfectly normal sans the support item.
You're not a support if you're buying nothing but damage items. If you don't have at least that much damage, then you were trolling picking a mage support to begin with.
overtuned or just performing fucking awesome.
